participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Creative and friendly, enjoys connecting with others through music.
participant_1.background: I live in nashville. I like to go to the farmers market every weekend. I work in academia at a local university. I play music in my spare time.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic, loves sharing experiences and teaching kids.
participant_2.background: I love music of the 1980s, especially the pretenders. I am a kindergarten teacher. My favorite food is spicy tex mex. I have a puppy named tiki. I studied early childhood education in college.

content.text: Hi, my name is [Name]. I'm new to Nashville and I'm looking for some friends.
Hi, welcome to Nashville! I'm [Name], and I'm also a transplant. What are you interested in?
I love music and playing music. I'm also a big fan of the farmers market.
Oh, that's great! I love the farmers market too. I'm actually a kindergarten teacher, and I love to cook with my students.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a teacher. I'm a musician and I love playing music.
Oh, that's great! What kind of music do you play?
I play guitar and piano. I love to play all different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably blues.
That's awesome! I love blues music too. I actually play drums.
Oh, that's great! We should jam sometime!
That would be awesome! I'd love to jam with you.
Great! I'm free this weekend. Do you want to come over to my place and jam?
That sounds great! I'll bring my drums.
Awesome! I can't wait to meet you.
